message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900000. It's a unique opportunity, and I believe the value it offers will be well worth the investment. Let me know your thoughts!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe I can't justify the price of $900000 at this time. I am willing to pay up to $850000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I understand your perspective, $850000 doesn't quite cover the value I place on this product.  I'm willing to come down to $875000. This is a fair compromise that allows us both to benefit from this transaction. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.

Thank you for considering my perspective, Alice. I understand your position and appreciate the reduction in price. However, I still feel that $875000 might not fully align with what I can afford at this time. I would like to propose $860000 as a potential compromise. I hope this offer will be acceptable to you.
